name: Drag Dash
description:
Match the incoming shape with the same color.
Train your brain and reflexes with this fun puzzle game.

Drag the corresponding shape with proper color and drop into the black square.

- Addicting gameplay
- Modern graphic elements (flat design)
- Atmospheric music and sound effects
- 3 different shapes (dots, squares, triangles)
- 3 different colors (red, blue, yellow)

Please rate it 5 stars if you like it... Have fun!
